name: The Riddle Game - A Challenging Word Puzzle Game for Your Brain
name_original: The Riddle Game - A Challenging Word Puzzle Game for Your Brain
description:
Riddle Game is an invigorating game of riddles. This fantastic game will challenge your wits and bewilder your mind. You will be given a riddle and the appropriate amount of letter spaces for the answer. You must figure out the answer to each riddle. Random letter choices will be provided. Correct answers will flash in green and award you coins. Earn coins as you complete each of the levels.

This amazing Riddle Game is a wonderful game app for children, teens and adults. There are no time limits so you can enjoy playing the Riddle Game just about anywhere. Use the "Reset" button or tap the letters to remove unwanted letter choices. Earn trophies for completing riddles successfully.

Riddle Game has some really cool options. Perplexed over a riddle? Don't lose your head! This wonderful, puzzling game has a "Hint" button. This helpful button will give you a clue. Still baffled? Try the "Show" button. This handy button gives you a random letter to the answer. Out of "hints" or "shows"? Click over to the awesome game store and trade some coins for a hint or show. If that's not enough help, use the "Friend" button and ask your friends via Facebook or Twitter.

This marvelous game also allows you to quickly and easily earn more coins. Simply watch a short video or tell your friends about the Riddle Game via Face Book and Twitter and you can earn coins.

WARNING!!! Exerting your brain too hard during the Riddle Game may cause temporary exasperation and steam to flow from your ears.
